parameters.name: AssignMac
parameters.description: Specifies whether to assign a mac address.

parameters.description: By default, popApi is not ignored and idempotent

parameters.name: NetworkInterfaceId

parameters.name: SkipConfig
parameters.description:
The default value is false. If you set the value to true, the secondary private IP address application process can be accelerated.

>  For more information, submit a ticket.

parameters.name: SubnetId
parameters.description: It belongs to the Lingjun subnet.
